result.execSummary:
The defendant Logan J Lenz was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Burglary-Building or Dwelling [Modifiers: Repeater, PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class F felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.10(1m)(a).
  • Theft-Movable Property >$10,000 [Modifiers: Repeater, PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).
  • Criminal Damage to Property [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime, Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.01(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  

COURT ORDERS: 
15CF452:
Ct. 1 (Buglary-Building or Dwelling-Repeater-PTAC)>> 11 Years WSPS, 6 years IC and 5 years ES, to run concurrent to other counts and 15CM694 and 13CF748. Defendant to obtain GED. Court Costs including DNA Surcharge.

Ct. 2 (Theft-Movable Property >$10,000-Repeater-PTAC)>> 10 Years WSPS, 5 years IC and 5 years ES, to run concurrent to other counts and 15CM694 and 13CF748. Defendant to obtain GED. Court Costs including DNA Surcharge.

Ct. 3 (Criminal Damage to Property-PTAC-Repeater)>> 2 Years WSPS, 1 years IC and 1 years ES, to run concurrent to other counts and 15CM694 and 13CF748. CONDITIONS: Assessment/treatment/counseling as recommended including AODA and any follow up, Absolute sobriety from drugs and alcohol, No Contact with UW-Marathon County, J.H., L.C., S.N.,  Good faith effort to maintain Full time work/Full time school or a combination while incarcerated and on ES, Restitution to be determined, Eligible for programming immediately.  Defendant to obtain GED. Court Costs including DNA Surcharge.

COURT FINDS 98 DAYS CREDIT.

15CM694:
Ct. 3 (BJ-Repeater)>> 2 Years WSPS, 1 years IC and 1 years ES, to run concurrent to 15CF452 and 13CF748. CONDITIONS: Assessment/treatment/counseling as recommended including AODA and any follow up, Absolute sobriety from drugs and alcohol, No Contact with UW-Marathon County, J.H., L.C., S.N.,  Good faith effort to maintain Full time work/Full time school or a combination while incarcerated and on ES, Restitution to be paid, Eligible for programming immediately.
